fields_of_interest: Competition, Energy, Environment, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Renewable Energy Directive, Fuels Quality Directive, Circular Economy, Bioeconomy, Clean Vehicle Directive
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Leaders of Sustainable Biofuels, Petroleum and Biofuels Association Finland
goals__remit:
The vision of St1 is to be the leading producer and seller of CO2 aware energy. Our goal is to develop and commercialize functional and environmentally sustainable solutions and to deliver these solutions in a profitable way. 
 
Each solution must be: 
•technically ready for use today 
•ecologically and ethically sustainable 
•logistically feasible 
 
The mission of St1 is to replace fossil fuels in a competitive and sustainable way by producing bioethanol cost-efficiently from waste and residues. 
 
Domestic biofuel production from waste and residues results in lower CO2- emissions and reduced dependence on fossil fuel imports. St1 Biofuels only uses feedstocks that are outside the food chain and will not cause any direct or indirect land use changes.
